uniol.apt.io.parser

Interface Parser<G>

  • Type Parameters:
    G - Type of object that the parser produces.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractParser, AptLTSParser, AptPNParser, GenetPNParser, LoLAPNParser, PetrifyLTSParser, PetrifyPNParser, PnmlPNParser, RegexParser, SynetLTSParser, SynetPNParser

    public interface Parser<G>
    Interface for generic parsers.
    Author:
    vsp, Uli Schlachter
